{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = WAX206 wShadow Right 27Jan21.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Essentials WiFi 6 AX3200 Dual Band Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax206/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = WAX206 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -100NAS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/01/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Netgear_WAX206 |wlclass = AX3200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY321100533 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7622BV; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.35 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TC58CVG1S3HRAIJ; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8221B; |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531AE; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:A6:7E |oui = 94:A6:7E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, HE80, WPA3 |addchip = PMIC;MediaTek;MT6380N;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/30/2021 |estreldate = 07/12/2021 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B098BRF91P |asin_country = US |asin2 = B098FGLPSR |asin_country2 = IT |asin3 = B098FGLPSR |asin_country3 = DE |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7915AN; |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975AN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Models=== :;[[Netgear WAC series]] • [[Netgear]] • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/ Access Points] *[[Netgear WAC104]] (AC1200) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wac104/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAC124]] (AC2000) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wac124/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX202]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax202/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX204]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax204/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX206]] (AX3200) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax206/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX214]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax214/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX218]] (AX3600) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax218/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX610]] - AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX610Y]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610y/ PPage] *[[Netgear WAX610PA]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610pa/ PPage]
